title: The New Champions of the World and the Future of the Patriots | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 235)
description:
The Ringer's Robert Mays and Kevin Clark sit down the morning after the Super Bowl to discuss Doug Pederson's masterful offensive game plan (03:00), memorable postgame moments (12:15), "the 15 percent chance rule" (21:00), where the Patriots go from here (28:45), an unreal performance by Rob Gronkowski (31:45), and Tom Brady's decision-making in the last two possessions (35:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
